validate.name_2: Name must be at least 2 characters
validate.name_40: Name must be less than 40 characters
validate.password_8: Password must be at least 8 characters
validate.url_http: URL must start with http or https
validate.api_invalid: Please enter a valid API URL
validate.api_http: API URL must start with http or https
validate.api_slash: API URL must not end with /

anime.empty: Please add a RSS subscription first.

downloads.empty_torrents: No torrents found in all downloaders
downloads.alert: This action will delete the task from the downloader, but the downloaded files will not be deleted.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose how Nyaatify looks to you.

language.title: Language
language.description: This is the language of Nyaatify. This setting is saved in your browser.

title_priority.title: Title Priority
title_priority.description: The anime title will be displayed in the order of the selected language.

cover_source.title: Cover Source
cover_source.description: Choose your favorite anime cover: Bangumi uses standard covers, Anilist removes the anime title from the cover.

add.title: Add a New RSS Subscription
add.description: Add a Nyaa or Mikan RSS subscription to track anime publication. It may take a few minutes to parse all anime data.
add.name: Name

list.title: RSS Subscription List
list.empty: Please add a RSS subscription first.
list.alert: This action will delete this RSS subscription permanently. The anime included in this RSS will also be DELETED.

priority.title: Parsing Priority
priority.description: Choose the parsing strategy for anime titles. When AI config is invalid or parsing fails, the local parser will be used as a fallback.

ai.title: AI Model
ai.description: Add a LLM for AI parsing, the model's API should be compatible with OpenAI interfaces. To ensure accuracy, try not to use the lowest grade Lite model.

reset.title: Reset AI Model
reset.description: This action will remove the current AI model configuration, which cannot be recovered.

add.title: Add a New Downloader
add.description: Add a downloader to manage your download tasks.
add.name: Name
add.type_notice_qb: Notice: qBittorrent minimum compatible version is 4.1.0
add.type_notice_tr: Notice: Transmission minimum compatible version is 1.0
add.type_notice_ar: Notice: Aria2 minimum compatible version is 1.0

list.title: Downloaders List
list.alert: This action will delete this downloader permanently.

default.title: Default Downloader
default.description: When creating download tasks, Nyaatify will prioritize downloading through this downloader.

state.title: Show Downloader State
state.description: Show the state of downloader on anime page, such as no downloader or downloader offline.

add.title: Add a New Notification
add.description: Add a notification service to receive message pushes when new anime releases.
add.name: Name
add.filter_notice: Enter the RSS subscription name to receive notifications only for new anime releases from this subscription. For multiple subscriptions, separate them with commas. Leave it blank to receive all notifications.
add.extra_notice: The extra parameters added will be sent together in the POST request. For multiple parameters, separate them with “&”.

variable.description: Custom variables must be wrapped in double curly braces like {{title_jp}}. Please check the spelling carefully, otherwise empty content will be returned.
variable.rss: RSS subscription name of this anime

list.title: Notification List
list.empty: Please add a notification service first.
list.alert: This action will delete this notification service permanently.

username.title: Change Username
username.description: Change the username of your account.

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Change the password of your account. The new password will not be confirmed twice, please ensure the password correct.

devices.title: Logged in Devices
devices.alert: After logging out, you will need to log in again the next time you use the device.

project.title: Overview
project.author: Author
project.author_desc: Nyaatify is designed and developed by <0>@nuthx</0>.
project.license_desc: This project is open-sourced under the <0>MIT License</0>.
project.contributor_desc: Contributions are welcome! Feel free to submit <0>Pull Requests</0> or report issues in <1>Issues</1>.

404.title: 404 Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exists.
